Photo / Composite.

FMG Young Farmer of the Year 2025: Aorangi regional final won by Gareth McKerchar https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/fmg-young-farmer-farmer-of-the-the-the-the-2025-aorangi- griginal-riginal-final-final-won-by-gareth-mckerchar/yuejvdvmorbcfppehavae464644ddy/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/fmg-young-farmer-farmer-of-the-the-the-the-2025-aorangi- griginal-riginal-final-final-won-by-gareth-mckerchar/yuejvdvmorbcfppehavae464644ddy/ Gareth McKerchar has won the Aorangi Young Farmer of the Year for the second year in a row Mon, 31 Mar 2025 03:00:00 +0000 Jack Taggart (second), winner Gareth McKerchar, and third placegetter Samuel Allen at the Young Farmer of the Year Aorangi regional final.
